meanings.definition: The quality or state of being covered in snow.
meanings.sent1: The snowiness of the landscape made it look like a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent2: I love the snowiness of the mountains during ski season.
meanings.sent3: The snowiness of the town caused a traffic jam as everyone tried to drive carefully.
meanings.sent4: Her dress sparkled with a snowiness that reminded me of a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The snowiness of the scene was so pure and peaceful, it took my breath away.

meanings.definition: The amount or degree of snow present in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: We measured the snowiness in inches to see how much had fallen overnight.
meanings.sent2: The snowiness in the city was causing delays in public transportation.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected snowiness caught everyone off guard, but the kids were thrilled for a snow day.
meanings.sent4: The snowiness on the trees glistened in the sunlight like a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The heavy snowiness made it difficult to see more than a few feet ahead while driving.
